name: Video Testimonial slider
author: Sumanta Dhank

sections.description:
Shortcode üëâ [vts_slider] üëà

Best video Testimonial Slider plugin for WordPress website.

You also get to customize the testimonials' Star review background color, Video play buttin Color. Set number of word display in quote.

üèÜ Features of The Video Testimonial Slider

  • Swiper Slider
  • Star review background color change
  • Video play buttin Color change
  • You can change number of word display in quote

2 Easy Steps to Using Video Testimonial Slider Plugin

When you have installed the plugin and are ready to display your testimonials.

  1. Add all the members that you want to display along with all the necessary fields and profile images.

    • Step1: Title or name of the user
    • Step2: Testimonial content, which is the user's comments or quote
    • Step3: Designation of user
    • Step4: Country of user that display flag on the image corner
    • Step5: Star Rating, You can set 1 to 5
    • Step6: Video URL, You need youtube embed video url (ex: https://www.youtube.com/embed/ppawFI1u6Po)
    • Step5: Featured Image, User image

2.¬†Click on testimonial then Settings. Set your Star review background color, Set Video play buttin Color. Then just copy the shortcode and paste it on the page or post.

üèÜ Available Testimonial Fields

The following are the fields that this plugin allows you to have on your testimonials:

  • Title or name of the user
  • The profile image of the user
  • Testimonial content, which is the user's comments
  • Designation field
  • Country flag option
  • Star Rating
  • Video URL
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded video-testimonial-slider zip file
  2. Upload the ‘video-testimonial-slider’ folder and its contents into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation
  3. Activate Video Testimonial slider from Plugins page

Requirements

  • WordPress version: >= 5.0
  • PHP version: >= 7.2
sections.changelog:
1.0 (January 20, 2023)

  • Initial load of the plugin.

1.1 (February 16, 2023)

  • CSS bug fix

short_description: Video Testimonial Slider plugin for WordPress website. Using plugin to display client Review and Testimonial with video popup through shortcode.
